snippet.title: Red Solstice 2 | Console Launch - Ultimate Edition Trailer
snippet.description:
Available Now on Steam, PS4, PS5, Xbox One and Xbox X|S! Red Solstice 2: Survivors Ultimate Edition contains the base game, as well as all previously released DLCs, including new storylines, classes, maps and much more! And now it's on console! 

Get It Here: https://theredsolstice.com/

Red Solstice 2 is a tactical sci-fi RPG combining real-time strategy with real-time combat, playable in single-player or co-op with up to three friends. Plan your moves and issue orders in real time. Manage resources, research new tech and upgrade your base to survive.

Stay up to date with the latest news from these 505 Games lands by following us across our community channels:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Instagram: https://instagram.com/505_games
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/505games
Blog: https://505games.com/blog/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/505-games/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/505games
